website_summaries.verdict: After a few weeks using Advanced Eyelash Conditioner, you'll have people asking if you're wearing eyelash extensions.
pros: Helps make lashes fuller and longer with daily treatment
See results in just a few weeks
Easy to apply without making a mess
cons: Expensive for the amount that you get
A few have had reactions to it

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT—DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: I have used Revitalash Advanced many times with absolutely amazing results, and I highly recommend this product. I was born with short, thin lashes, and within a few weeks of using it my lashes have always begun to grow much longer and thicker. However, the product I received from this company is counterfeit! I began to wonder about it after I had been using it for several weeks with no results. Then I looked closely at the tube and compared it to the photos on the Revitalash website. The lettering on the product I received was black, not blue as in the photos. Also, there was no batch number. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Machell G

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This product has to be a fake of the real stuff. I usually buy in a boutique but recently moved so bought online. I should have listened to the other reviews that suggested it was a fake. You can tell by the packaging and the label on the tube. Also, used it for weeks and go 0 results.
customer_reviews.author: kchesser

customer_reviews.title: Fake - Expired - Or Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: This is either not real or expired. I have been using the real product for years and was running low so I ordered. Then I opened this one and decided to use the previous one on my lower lashes. Immediately I noticed it smelled differently. Two weeks later all my extremely long lashes started falling out a couple every day. On one eye all the long one are gone and on the other only two are left. Im furious to have wasted 150 for this but even more to have lost my lashes :(. Back to wearing mascara and looking elsewhere to purchase my revitalash!!!@
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Smith

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and highly recommend. I have used this for 6 weeks and I cannot believe the growth. My lashes were damaged from using the eye curler. It is expensive but if you want healthy looking lashes this is the product. I then got a Keratin Lash Lift and tint. I no longer use an eye curler and my lashes look so healthy. The product is easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Revitalash did seem to have original packaging. It ...
customer_reviews.text: My Revitalash did seem to have original packaging. It says on the box, see inside box for directions. But there are no instructions on the box nor are there a separate page folded up inside the box. I'm concerned I didn't get an original.
customer_reviews.author: Tray117

customer_reviews.title: Sample size!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works beautifully, but this is a free SAMPLE size! Do not buy! Usually 3.2 ml for $89 on Amazon. This listing doesn't state the correct volume and as such is nearly 3x the normal price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Less product, more money
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much and have had success with it. My issue is that for $98, I expected the same amount of product that I purchased a few months ago. Sadly, although the tube size is the same, the amount of product is about 1/4 less that my old tube. So I guess increasing the price wasn't enough, now the amount in each tube has been reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this product. It irritated my eyes after only one use. My eyelids became extremely red and itchy. I would not recommend this product. Update: I purchased this same product directly from Revitalash's website and it did not sting my eyes or cause an allergic reaction. Within three weeks I'm seeing growth. I believe the product being sold on Amazon is either old or a knock off. Both Amazon and Revitalash are the same price, so why take the risk?
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, you will notice a difference in two weeks. Everyone asks if my eyelashes are real!! Some people don't believe me when I tell them they are mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Not in original packaging
customer_reviews.text: I received the RevitaLash Advanced today and was disappointed to find the product's cellophane covering had been removed and replaced with a badly-fitting plastic bag sealed with scotch tape. Since the cellophane had been removed, I am returning it. There is no expiration date on the box. Possibly it was on the original cellophane? I don't want a product that appears to have been opened or old. The RevitaLash should have been wrapped in it's original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Liz T

customer_reviews.title: Sad face
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered revitalash numerous times in the past and it has always worked quite well. This time it did not. I used it faithfully for over 4 weeks and I saw NO results :(
customer_reviews.author: Tgebel

customer_reviews.title: Red eyes..
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I am using it right... but I use it at night and when I wake up my eyes are really red like I have allergies. I tried it a few times and it burns and hurts my eyes...
customer_reviews.author: andreina briceno

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before and I saw improvement almost immediately; however, I have not seen any changes or improvements in my lashes after almost a month of using the product as directed. Moreover, this size seems to be empty from the get-go. I can hardly see the liquid on the brush. I am very dissatisfied. As a regular customer, I had hoped to see the results I previously experienced, especially for the price I paid. I don't think I'll be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Reviews a pack of lies
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for 6 weeks and see totally no difference. I will no longer depend on reviews. I am convinced that at least 65% of reviews are people paid to give positive comments. It’s one thing when the product is $20 and quite another when paying almost $100 as in this case. Save your money and do not buy this product. Save your time by not reading and trusting all the positive comments on most products. Ow that prime is going up again to $115 in February I am seriously considering not renewing.
customer_reviews.author: Billiekay Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I have used other lash serums and of all of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used other lash serums and of all of them I saw the least result with this one. I used every night for 30 days and didn't feel as though the appearance of fullness or length of my lashes budged at all. I used the bottom of a tube of Rodan & Fields lash serum for three days and could see results even with the last few drops I had. It's more expensive but I get a discount and I've already ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and you don't have to use it everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and you don't have to use it everyday to get results. But the advert did NOT say 1 ml. I wrongly assumed it would be a replacement for my 3.5 ml product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for almost a month and I don't see any change in length but I do notice I have more lashes. The price is high but happy with the results so far. I've tried several different lash serums at lower prices that did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Pdx

customer_reviews.title: So bad
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed so sad hate the seller product was dry and empty inside and so old :( I want my refund
customer_reviews.author: Lana Pas

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest skeptic here. Didn’t want to consider Latisse as it can change your eye color and very expensive. Thought I’d give this a try since it was only $98.00 for s three month supply. Wow! Noticed significant growth and thickness after about 6 weeks. I apply every night. I’m a 54 year old woman with sparse lashes until now! I’m so stoked about this product. Have already told friends and family. I only wish I did a before photo to show the difference. I had no faith it would actually work. I was shocked it worked! Happy camper here.
customer_reviews.author: M. Serra

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING - REACHED OUT TO COMPANY WHO DIDN'T RESPOND
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 6 months and then just stopped working. My eyelashes are shorter and thinner than before I started using it. I sent the company an email to ask if this was normal and they never bothered to respond. This stuff is expensive and I bought it because I thought the company had integrity but they obviously don't. Don't buy this product. I am researching other products that use all natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Chandler

customer_reviews.title: MAY BE FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have listened to other Verified Purchase reviews on this product. I think it might be a fake product. Everyone I talked to about this product said that it really worked. I was excited to try it. I used it every day for about 3 1/2 weeks. I took before and after pictures. I noticed absolutely no difference. I did notice a slight eye irritation, but I continued to use the product because I wanted the results and thought my irritation may have just been due to winter dryness. I warn others, DO NOT BUY this product, at least from this seller. I would buy direct from the company if I was to try this again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious
customer_reviews.text: This product does work! With that being said on two separate occasions when I have used it I had a large bump appear under my eyelid. After I discontinued use the first time it almost went away completely. Thinking it could be coincidental I purchased another tube several months later and the same thing happened. The second time I ended up seeking medical attention and it is still very obvious. Also had some irritation as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Honeggar

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: My lashes are almost touching my brow bone! Give it 6 to 8 weeks of every night application. You’ll be blown away!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Karney

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this last tube I purchased. The tube has a dark blue wand in a silver tube. Prior tubes are all silver. Leaving on vacation so I thought maybe they just changed their packaging. After about 3 weeks with no results and knowing something wasn’t right I threw it out... $98.00 bucks down the tube. Ordered new tube from Nordstroms... same price. So happy I did. I have used Revitalash for several years and highly recommended it. But... no more buying it from Amazon since you can’t confirm the product until after the fact and after reading several negative reviews I think the same thing happened to them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron L

customer_reviews.title: will buy again...!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would work but I really was feeling desperate. Silly, but one of my eyes has MUCH shorter lashes than the other. Bugs me daily. I used this and after about 5 weeks I was amazed. MY eye with the shorter lashes actually matched the other one...and it seems that they are even a little longer! My lashes do not seem thicker, just longer and I am happy with that!! I am now applying it every other day to that one eye. I figure that this tube will last me a full year. And yes, I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: topmom

customer_reviews.title: Previously ordered and product was great, but the third time was NOT the charm..fake or bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I've previously ordered 2x from this same seller and the product I received worked well and did not irritate my eyes at all, so I felt comfortable ordering for a third time to replenish before I ran out of my previous supply. I received this product in February, but started using it about 6 weeks ago it and it has been leaving my eyes red, teary, and stinging all day after use. On top of that, no results, so I just trashed $98. My suggestion: save your money, order either directly from Revitalash or another reputable store (i.e. Dermstore).
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: not properly sealed for the $$$$ what to do??
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet and am not sure what I will but to the company that sent or makes it I would say for the $$$$$ this product was NOT SEALED properly! one bit of film over the top of the cardboard box, not both ends or fully enclosed, and NO SEALING inside on the product itself?????? Not around the cylinder or the opening from which it is unscrewed!! I don't know if it has been used and returned or if it even has the stated amount of product in it? This is NOT a good start and may be a deal breaker. What do you think?? Christina
customer_reviews.author: Suzy q

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I will be honest, I have a bad habit of not using it daily. I might miss a day here and there or go every other day for a few days. It still did a fantastic job. My lashes has not changed in color much, but they are almost twice as full as they were before and noticeably longer. I am only on week 5. I already purchased a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: xylia

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% FAKE!!!! Does not work! Do not buy this item!! I saw reviews that said the same thing and bought it anyways. I’ve used the real product and know it can take 3-4 weeks to see results. Smelled and felt like the real product, but it’s either very diluted or fake! It’s been over a month and the only thing I have now is a stye on my right eyelid. This is fraud!!
customer_reviews.author: Kori A Hames

customer_reviews.title: CRAZY RESULTS!
customer_reviews.text: It does take awhile to see them, but after about 5-6 weeks - wham! I did eye lash extensions for about 6 months and once I stopped, my eyelashes were so, so short. I had a meltdown. My lashes have always been pretty long, but never full (hence the eyelash extensions). I read the reviews for this product and bought it right away. I have been using this product for months and my lashes are so long they tough my eyebrows and they are incredibly dark and full! I have just purchased my second bottle! This product lasted me from May to September and I applied two swipes per eye every night to clean lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Beck

customer_reviews.title: Thanks, I grew them myself
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 3 years, its absolutely amazing. I get complements daily, everyone thinks I have fake lashes. I always say, I grew them myself with a little help ;) It takes a few weeks to notice a difference but trust me if you keep using this product, it will deliver. I even had to stop using it for a while since my lashes were so long, I couldn't wear glasses. Side note: I tried Latisse, didn't work as well.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca campbell

customer_reviews.title: Totally fake DON'T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the true RevitaLash for a year. After about a month, I noticed my eyelashes growing...after a couple of months I really noticed a difference and by 5 months I was thrilled. Then I got this FAKE RevitaLash for Christmas and noticed that my eyelashes were withering away. No growth whatsoever; in fact I've been losing eyelashes. After 4 months, I'm convinced this product is worthless. Amazon needs to do a better job screening its vendors. I'm going to be a lot more wary of buying through Amazon going forward.
customer_reviews.author: SLD

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Revitalash for over a year now. It has worked for me. I still don't have long, lushes lashes, but they are longer and there is a difference. My 4 stars was for the price. It is very expensive and I would hope that with all the competition, the price would come down in the future. You have to use it forever, I suppose. If you stop using it, as your long lashes fall out (and they do naturally) you will go back to what you had before you used it.
customer_reviews.author: RLG

customer_reviews.title: I like the product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product sparingly for a year. There is a visible difference in the length of my lashes. I am 61 years old, so anything to distract from wrinkles is a positive thing!
customer_reviews.author: ann c kammien

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I started using this at the recommendation of a friend, who is an RN at a high-end med spa. Her lashes were long and lush, so I asked what she was using. It's had the same result for me, and also for another friend. I started using daily on bare lashes, and am now down to maintenance about 3-4 times a week. We are hooked, and I would do without food in order to keep this in my budget.
customer_reviews.author: MollyB

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it steadily for over 6 months and people have remarked how beautiful my lashes look
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer for this. I have been using it steadily for over 6 months and people have remarked how beautiful my lashes look. my esthetician even asked if I had inserts!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this product. I’m in he Professional beauty industry and have tried them all. Revitalash is hands down the best. I have long lashes but they are longer and fuller while using this product. I occasionally sleep in my mascara ( bad I know) any lashes that break off revitalash helps grown them back in super fast. You should start seeing Results after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: KS811

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results in two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results in two weeks...I was very skeptical but this was recommended to me by an eyelash professional...I wish I had taken a before pic cause after two weeks I can't believe the difference...I was advised that the trick is u must use it every night and the results r amazing!!! I've never had long eyelashes that I could just swipe w a coat of mascara and carry on...highly recommend...could probably put eyelash extensions out of business!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Haslam

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product forever. It works like a dream. This one / not sure what it is but this is NOT Revitalash. This is the first time I have ever purchased a fraudulent product on Amazon and I order stuff like crazy. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT, it is not the real thing. Extremely upset given the exorbitant price I paid
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Showalter

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years and always get compliments on my lashes. It’s super simple to use and really works so I feel like it’s worth the money. It does cause my eyelids to turn a darker color of pink though.
customer_reviews.author: Blaire

customer_reviews.title: but im struggling whether i like it or not because the skin around my eyes ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, but im struggling whether i like it or not because the skin around my eyes are now dark and red. I wonder if it was this product that caused it because a lot of others have reported the same issue
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Best product to grow your eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: Best product to grow your eyelashes. You won't believe the difference in just a few weeks. I think this is the smaller one that Amazon sells; the larger costing around $95.00 (don't quote me:). If you were to purchase the larger size in dermatologists offices you would pay $150.00! You will be amazed at the difference in your eyelashes!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: ONE TIME USE- RED EYELID
customer_reviews.text: Only after one time use my eyelids became red and irritated! I’ve used other last boost serums before and they didn’t make my eyelids red! Will not be continuing to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Hhaddad

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think I’ll repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this about 8 weeks now. There is some difference - just not sure if it’s enough to justify the price for aesthetics alone. If things change dramatically over the next month I’ll update.
customer_reviews.author: Lilo-a

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Revitalash numerous times over the years and was always amazed at the results within a few weeks. This time around I've noticed absolutely nothing after over a month of use. Such a waste of money. I'm very disappointed and not quite sure what happened considering before my lashes would grow so fast and long that I'd have to actually trim them. My lashes have had zero improvement this time. This is odd since this is a product I've used for years and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Betti Mable

customer_reviews.title: WOW. MY LASHES ARE GROWING & FAST TOO
customer_reviews.text: My lashes are growing like weeds. I was using Latisse but this works much faster and much better and it’s a lot cheaper and with easier application. I was NOT disappointed buying this product. WOW.... Did I say WOW. I mean I saw a very noticeable difference in my lashes in about a month. I now only use it every other night.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda B

customer_reviews.title: It was empty!
customer_reviews.text: The serum containers I have previously used have been 5 to 6 times as big as this one even though it is supposed to be 3 ounces. The brush is dry indicating the container is empty. I emptied contents into a tiny container to see if there was actually something inside only to discover that nothing came out. The inside was dry and empty. i paid almost $60 for nothing. Of course I am dissatisfied and will look to another company.
customer_reviews.author: pnheaton

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product before in a bigger size, and it worked wonders. However, this particular size/batch is not working at all. Moreover, it feels that container is not full, because there is hardly any serum visible on the brush. (I use this product once a day for 4 weeks.) Very disappointed and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: HV

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I buy Revitalash. First time I bought it 4 years ago. Unfortunately, this time for the same amount of money I got about half of the product as last time. Packaging was also much nicer 4 years ago. This product does work for me. My lashes grew, were longer. But I do have some redness of upper eyelid. And this product is way too expensive. In the past 4 years I tried several other eyelash conditioners that were helpful and good enough, but at a fraction of the price. I won't be buying Revitalash again.
customer_reviews.author: Alina V Chernayenko

customer_reviews.title: This works.
customer_reviews.text: This product works. I have used way more expensive products like Babelash and this beats them all hands down. After years of extensions my real lashes were almost gone. I have been using this about 10 weeks now and I started to really notice a difference after 6 weeks. I will definitely buy more because I am so amazed by the results.
customer_reviews.author: Momigimarie

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying this from Amazon at first but I was so desperate because I lost almost all of my lashes due to lash extensions. I had such long lashes before and messed it up. I bought this and have been using it for a little over 2 months and my lashes are finally long again. I’m so happy it actually worked because of how expensive it is.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: My eyelashes have been falling out and leaving bare patches for some unknown reason. This serum has grown them all back and has my eyes looking normal again. I will purchase this again. My eyes were red for the first couple days using this, but that stopped after a few days. I do wish it made my eyelashes grow in thicker, but I am happy with having them back again.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great product, It works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It has worked fantastically. Its easy to use once you get over the fear of getting it in your eye. My lashes look great, so long and much fuller.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: I am shocked how little was in the tube!
customer_reviews.text: I’m blown away by these excellent reviews and decided I must try it! When the product arrived, I noticed that it FELT like there was little product inside, but figured maybe that’s how it was supposed to feel when shaking it. Sure enough, the product didn’t last long enough to see any effect. Needless to say, I was very disappointed and couldn’t believe it for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product in the past, but it didn't work for me this time.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a few years ago and it worked really well. I noticed within a few weeks of using it that my lashes grew in thicker and longer to the point where I had to trim a few of my lashes because they were too long. I had high hopes that I would have the same result this time, but I didn't. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before bought from other companies and it always worked.This product did not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this twice and my older lashes are lush again. I can now go out without mascara but if I use mascara my lashes are full. I didn't find that it worked as quickly as they suggest. It took a month before I saw results but I stuck with this product and I will continue to. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: C. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: the first one worked great, THIS ONE annoyed my eyes
customer_reviews.text: honestly, I'm not buying these on amazon anymore and neither should you. I've bought two, the first one worked great, THIS ONE annoyed my eyes, my eyelashes fell out and it just felt different. I decided to buy directly from the manufacturer, and it didn't even look the like real thing. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Product Does Not Match Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading reviews on various sites. I started with the smaller size, though still expensive, to make sure I didn't have a reaction to it. I am almost certain my product had almost evaporated, even though it was still sealed. I literally can not see or feel any product going on my eyelid when I run the small brush across. If I still had box, etc. I would request refund. Not at all happy and will not purchase again. Waste of my money. BABE lash beats this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Feild

customer_reviews.title: NOT GENUINE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I too, believed this to be the genuine Revitalash product. However like most others, when it came I compared it to my previous purchase (direct from an authorized seller) and it was different packaging and did not have the right sticker/bar code. I did not even try it because of other reviews. I'm not sure how this is rated so high and how Amazon can sell it compliantly but don't risk it. Your lashes/eyes are too important.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: this is a. rip-off
customer_reviews.text: The glowing reviews of this eyelash serum prompted me to order it. I have used serums in the past with excellent results. I was surprised to see that the Revitalash tube was half as long and considerably narrower than previous serum tubes despite costing nearly as much. Then I discovered it was also empty. When I applied it, the brush was barely damp. I returned it today. I hope Grandlash MD is still being produced and will order it if I can.
customer_reviews.author: Donatella

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works if you are buying the "real one". I have read the reviews that claim the ones sold on Amazon are fake, but the one I received I believe is the real thing. I have purchased some directly from RevitaLash and the packaging and everything else is exactly the same as the one I got from Amazon. I'm not saying the other products weren't fake because I know there are a lot of sub standard products sold over the internet, but because of that possibility I compared them closely when I read the previous reviews. If you are uncertain, you can order directly from RevitaLash - the cost is not much different as I recall.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Be patient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the beginning of February, and it wasn't until the end of March that my lashes got noticeably longer. I'm glad I stuck with it, because even if it took almost 2 months, it's now working and it's WORKING. My sister uses this and it worked much quicker for her, but I kept on because I paid for it and figured there was nothing to use if I used the whole bottle. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product. I have tried other eyelash growth products but this is truly the best (doesn't change your eye color like others can). If you say this product doesn't work you aren't be consistent with its application. It does take a few weeks but give it time it will work. Like most products if you stop using it your lashes will go back to their natural length. This product is BEST if you are growing our your eye lashes after false lash use.
customer_reviews.author: Ft Worth, TX

customer_reviews.title: “My lashes started falling out”
customer_reviews.text: I have used RevitaLash in the past with great results. I usually buy from my local spa but they were out of stock so I decided to purchase online. BIG MISTAKE!! After using this product for about 2 weeks I noticed my eye lashes started falling out (which usually happens to me after discontinuing RevitaLash). After reading some of the reviews I’m convinced that this is not “the real thing”. SAVE YOUR MONEY. STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Beale

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: A great product. It works well and helped my partner grow her lashes back after years of wearing lash extenders and fake lashes. Too bad that is not sold in California so we end up having it shipped to our winter home in Forida.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Hashemian, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Post baby lashes
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product about 10 years ago to achieve more lash volume (pre-children). I saw results within 1 month. I had very long lashes that people thought they were faux lashes! I had my second child 2 years ago and almost all my lashes have fallen out, with minimal regrowth. I bought this 1 month ago to wake up my eyes and the results are the same. So pleased my eyes look more alive! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sdp0103

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear - FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: This item seems to be a fake. I've purchased it before from a reputable retailer and had amazing results. After using this for almost 3 months it appears to be very expensive water. Steer clear and spend the extra money to buy another retailer.
customer_reviews.author: SHerri A. Heino

customer_reviews.title: causes redness around eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have used several eyelash lengthener products and was very disappointed by this one, because it caused red swelling around my eyes. I was applying it per the directions and this still happened. I tried it a few different times, letting my eyes recover for a week in between. The redness happened each time. Very disappointed that there is not a return feature here on Amazon for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lehman

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works, been using it 10 yrs. Of all my friends and coworkers I'm one of maybe 3 that don't wear those terrible eye lash extensions. I have been consistently using revitalash for many years and I am continuously stopped by women saying "what beautiful eyelashes I have. People can barely believe they are not fake. I never had an eye irritation, reaction or any side effect from it just beautiful lasher. And truthfully I have written the name Revitalash on a a piece of paper probably over 50x for people asking what's the name and where they can gets this product..
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. It takes a good month or more to see results, but as soon as you give it the time you’ll love what you see. Everyone I’ve recommended it to loves it. Well worth the money for such great results!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Revitalash for a number of years and have been happy with the results. This last purchase was disappointing because it seemed that the container was barely filled.
customer_reviews.author: Bhsdesign

customer_reviews.title: Will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Good product My lashes too short through two week I can see positive difference .. but the price expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amal A.

customer_reviews.title: I am getting so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: This stuff!!! It’s amazing!!! I am super impatient so after 2 weeks I didn’t see anything and was ready to give up. But the, bam! It seemed like they just grew over night and haven’t stopped. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This does nothing
customer_reviews.text: Well it does do one thing; it makes my eyelids red. I try to just get it on my lashes but it makes a red line on the bottom of the lid where the lashes grow. That can't be good. This product no longer has the chemical that promotes eye lash growth but they are still promoting it like it's going to do something. It's not. Just a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Lost my eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: Within a week of starting to use, my eyelashes were practically gone. Unfortunately, I appear to have clicked on the box to have automatic shipments . Have tried everything to stop the shipments from Amazon and have not succeeded.
customer_reviews.author: Wednesday's Child

customer_reviews.title: Darkened the skin around my eyes
customer_reviews.text: This product unfortunately started to darken my skin around my eyes . I stopped using it after only a few times . Luckily the area around my eyes returned eventually to its normal pigment .
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous
customer_reviews.text: I have used this sporadically, which isn't going to work. I was in the hospital this year for several months, and used it every day and or night. I cannot believe my eyelashes....so long, they almost look fake!! I have never had lashes, merely a "fringe". This stuff is amazing. Got it because a friend of mine was sitting in the front seat and her lashes were SO LONG!!!!! I'll never go without it.
customer_reviews.author: rcrox

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This size usually last me around 6months or more, so I can justify the expense. This stuff REALLY works and you start noticing a difference within a week or two. My mom has very little eyelashes and eye allergies. She can use this product without issue and the make-up artist for my brother's wedding noticed the difference in my mom's eyelashes from the first consulation to the week before his wedding!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Steinhauer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!!!  Too bad bottle was only one third filled
customer_reviews.text: RivitalLash works outstanding! It said it would take approximately 6 weeks for eyelashes to become longer and thicker. After only two weeks there is an unbelievable difference! This product by far is the best one on the market. I have tried numerous others and this one is the best. The problem was when I just opened and started using my new 2 ml bottle. It was only a third full. There is definitely a defect. Can you please send me a new 2 ml bottle and I will send back this bottle that is clearly damaged. Than you,
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Soltroff

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it was working on my lashes at first,...but give it a few weeks for the hair to grow and it did and i'm not getting lashes every other week anymore !!! Saves me money ! it's lasted for over a month and i pay more than the $59 for my lash girl to help me out. You Just Put Her out of business.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA VANHOOK

customer_reviews.title: was empty
customer_reviews.text: please be advised that the package wasn't sealed and was empty . contact me for a replacement or refund. I purchased the regular size and its fine. Contact me at 917-817-3063 Thank you
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Some people are saying this doesn't work. Well I bought it anway. My lashes are considerably longer now than they were last month. I stopped wearing eye liner too, so now you really see my lashes. People are commenting on how long they are. So for me, this stuff works!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of years ago and had no results. Reading the other reviews of others that had no results, I checked my tube and it has the blue lettering which they say is the counterfeit one. Don't waste your money. I'm trying the Amazon recommended one now. What really stinks is I bought three tubes and it was like $150. What a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Better value than lash extensions
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but thankfully I had patience and waited for this to work its magic. Three months later, and my lashes are the longest they have ever been.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Meska-Flatten

customer_reviews.title: This is worth every dime if you don’t already have long eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The company via email, said their only certified dealer on Amazon is “Luxury Beauty”! This product has been amazing. I could not see my eyelashes for several years, before starting this product a year ago. Now I have beautiful, long eyelashes even without mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Betsey Hood

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because the Rodan & Fields version was out of stock. This product is ok - some lash growth noted, not a lot. It does darken my eyelids, though not overly noticeable. I would say overall the rating is fine, but not excellent - and granted, that could just be my reaction to it. With the expense, not 100% sure I'll repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: runnergal

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for going on 5 weeks, very strictly every evening. I’ve had success with Larissa and R+F Lash Boost within a few weeks so I expected to see results by now. I’ve seen very little results, if any. The only plus side to this product is it gave me 0 eye irritation, which I can’t say for the other two products I mentioned. I won’t be purchasing this again and will try to find a different product when this tube is empty.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing revivalash
customer_reviews.text: Notice the difference in size. I thought I had ordered a full size as a gift. Instead, a sample size arrived. Disappointing! IMG_3318.HEIC
customer_reviews.author: Judy L.

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I just used the last of my first tube, which lasted me about 4 1/2 months of nearly daily use. I'm 61, so my lashes were not as long and thick as they used to be. My lashes are now longer and darker, look good without mascara, and look fabulous with mascara. Even some very tiny lashes on my lower lash line that were almost invisible before I started are back. I just reordered, and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work + irritates eyes and skin
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work, don’t waste your money. Not only that, but irritates eyes a lot, and makes the area around my eyes red and irritable as well.
customer_reviews.author: R_

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: it's VERY effective.....i've been using it for years. tried a cheaper version and eyelashes "shrunk". it is overpriced. it can't get into calif, so i have to send to a friend in another state to forward to me
customer_reviews.author: mikki Broughton

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the size, price and results. After reading fairly good reviews on this product I bought it. I knew it was a trial size. Boy it is so tiny and don't think it was filled even halfway way. Used it for 4 weeks, 2x's a day and the bottle is empty and no results at all. I even did not apply mascara to my eyes for the 2 weeks to give it time grow.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: This product did not increase my lash growth at all. It doesn't even strengthen my lashes. For the $98 price tag, it was not worth it. Babe Lash and Rapidlash works so much better. I will never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: JTLE

customer_reviews.title: Its works in about 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I realized after getting lashes put on that after i took them off some of my eyelashes when with them. So i needed help. In 30 days i saw a big difference. My eyelashes are back!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Tube not sealed
customer_reviews.text: The tube itself was not sealed and Revitalash tubes always come sealed. I do not feel comfortable using this product so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Q

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness!  It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several products to help my lashes, and am now extremely sceptical about their effectiveness. I decided to give the trial size a shot, though, and I'm amazed. It actually works! You have to keep at it and not expect instant results. After all, if your lashes grew instantly you'd be dragging them on the floor before you got to the end of the trial size!
customer_reviews.author: Bookaholic

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years. Every now and then, I'll try another brand (usually in a left vs right challenge against Revitalash!) I always come back to this because it just flat works!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing results. After 3 months I had to stop using it because my eyelashes grew unbelievably long! Recommended by my dermatologist. Expensive but worth it, plus I got it at reduce price on Amazon Prime day.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A A

customer_reviews.title: LONG LAST
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Puts a coat on lashes prior to mascara to lengthen lashes. ALlow to dry for 30 secs then apply mascara- love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

product_meta.title: RevitaLash Cosmetics, RevitaLash Advanced Eyelash Conditioner, Lash Enhancing Serum, Physician Developed & Cruelty Free
